title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 23 September 2016 - XWiki
content:

09:43 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <vmassol> mflorea: good morning  
10:09 <vmassol> is there a way using the refactoring SS to rename a doc without setting redirects?  
10:09 <vmassol> ah yes  
10:09 <vmassol> found createRenameRequest()  
10:09 <mflorea> there must be  
10:09 <vmassol> I'll document it  
10:09 <vmassol> thanks  
10:10 <mflorea> vmassol: an example https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-web/src/main/webapp/templates/rename.vm#L56  
10:10 <vmassol> thx  
10:27 <vmassol> that should be it for the spam....  
10:27 <vmassol> (no more!)  
10:30 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:28 <vmassol> guys, I'm trying to find out how to render the title properly in the case when a title field has not been set (yes, I know that I could have not added a title xpoprety and used the title instead) but I'd prefer to keep it like this. So I'm trying this:  
11:28 <vmassol> #if ("$!doc.getValue('title')" != '')$doc.getValue('title')#else${doc.getPlainTitle()}#end  
11:28 <vmassol> this is in a sheet page  
11:28 <vmassol> however if the title xproperty is not set it displays the name of the sheet and not the doc on which it applies  
11:29 <vmassol> I think this is because of the default sheet fallback mechanism but I'm not sure how to make it work properly  
11:30 <vmassol> mflorea: any idea?  
11:30 <vmassol> I want the page name but I don't want "WebHome" :)  
11:30 <vmassol> so I want the algo that says page name and if page is webhome then parent space name  
11:32 <vmassol> I'll use the following for now but it assumes pages are non terminal (which is ok but I was wondering if I could do better):  
11:32 <vmassol> #if ("$!doc.getValue('title')" != '')$doc.getValue('title')#else${doc.documentReference.parent.name}#end  
11:32 <martinus\_\_> has quit  
11:37 <mflorea> vmassol: where did you put this code? calling getPlainTitle() in the title leads to an infinite loop  
11:37 <vmassol> actually it was working :)  
11:38 <vmassol> (except displaying the sheet page name)  
11:38 <vmassol> yes I was putting it in the title of the sheet page  
11:38 <vmassol> maybe we have a protection ;)  
11:38 <mflorea> no  
11:39 <mflorea> you didn't try with with an actual instance that had value for title  
11:39 <mflorea> I think  
11:39 <vmassol> I tried with both  
11:39 <vmassol> was working fine when there was a title set  
11:39 <mflorea> empty value for title I mean  
11:39 <vmassol> with empty it was displaying the sheet name  
11:39 <mflorea> in the app instance  
11:40 <vmassol> anyway don't spend too much time on this, I'm creating nested pages so my "hack" is enough for now  
11:40 <vmassol> I'm just curious if there's a solution  
11:50 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
11:52 <martinus\_\_> has joined #xwiki

17:05 <mflorea> vmassol: if you don't mind, I'm going to take care of http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-10375 in order to fix http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13256  
17:09 <vmassol> ah yes I'm sorry about that mflorea, I was supposed to fix this. I have some half-finished work locally but you're probably better off starting from scratch I guess. Ping me if you need help/explanations about what exists  
17:16 <mflorea> vmassol: most of the stuff I need already exists, but I will create a new module xwiki-platform-resource-temporary because I need some deps for the temp resource handler (e.g the container) and I'm not sure we need to add those to the resource-default module  
17:16 <vmassol> ok
